query: SELECT id, vesselTagNumber, SUBSTRING(recommendations, 1, 500) as recommendations_preview, LENGTH(recommendations) as rec_length, extractionQuality FROM inspections WHERE vesselTagNumber LIKE '%54-11-001%';
